name: Flappy Bee (itch) (AbCraft29)
description:
Flappy Bee

I made a game looks like Flappy Bird.

I Know its not very good because I am a beginner developer(Sorry for that).

Don't forget to put your Ideas in the comments below.

Note: The game is only for Android and Windows.

Here is new 2.0 update!

New Things

Added moving clouds to the game.

Added dead screen.

Changes

The gaps between top and bottom pipe now is little bit smaller.

The bee now is changing angle when flying.

Removed Things

Removed menu button that in the game, so to go to the main menu you will need to die and you will go to the menu from dead screen.
